description:
YARG is an Open-Source plastic band rhythm game! 
Play through the YARG Official Setlist for the crowd,
and maybe get some free items from your fans!

26.02.07.description:
This apworld features the 49 songs found on the Guitar Hero 1 PS2 disc.

YARG AP Client version 0.0.4 is required to play.

Includes an option to enable the 2 hidden songs that were on the disc but inaccessible through normal gameplay.
To do this, add "Guitar Hero 1 Hidden Songs" to the enabled_setlists option. I would highly recommend using the Options Creator for this.

Instrument shuffle is disabled for this apworld as Guitar Hero 1 only supported Lead Guitar.

Be sure to enter "GuitarHero1" without the quotes to the Game ID field when connecting your client.
26.02.07.title: Guitar Hero 1 version 1.0

26.02.21.description:
New apworld featuring the Rock Band 3 setllist.

New apworld combining the Guitar Hero 1, Rock Band 3, and YARG setlists.

Updates to the Guitar Hero 1 apworld are mostly backend changes to maintain compatibility going forward.

A tutorial for ripping songs or verifying existing rips has been provided in the Github readme.

If you previously had rips that worked with the version 1 of the Guitar Hero 1 apworld, they may no longer be compatible. However, they are relatively easy to fix. Refer to the guide on metadata in the Github readme.
26.02.21.title: Rock Band 3 version 1, Guitar Hero 1 version 1.1, All Setlists version 1

26.02.21.1.description: Fix an issue in YARGGuitarHero1.apworld that caused generation to fail.
26.02.21.1.title: Guitar Hero 1 ver 1.11 Hotfix
